mapper.insert: insert into config_exchange_order( tid, uid, withdraw_money, curr_money, transfer_amount, poundage , withdraw_number, channel, withdraw_ip , withdraw_order_number, uname, accumulate_water, accumulate_recharge , accumulate_excoins, register_ip, withdraw_type, exaa_status, create_time) values (#{tid}, #{uid}, #{withdrawMoney}, #{currMoney}, #{transferAmount}, #{poundage}, #{withdrawNumber}, #{channel}, #{withdrawIp}, #{withdrawOrderNumber}, #{uname}, #{accumulateWater}, #{accumulateRecharge}, #{accumulateExcoins}, #{registerIp}, #{withdrawType}, #{exaaStatus}, sysdate())
mapper.select: SELECT black_type blackType, black_num blackNum FROM sys_black WHERE (black_type ='1' AND black_num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{withdrawIp},'%')) OR (black_type ='2' AND black_num LIKE CONCAT('%',(select account from user_exchange where uid = #{uid} and type='0'),'%')) OR (black_type ='3' AND black_num LIKE CONCAT('%',(select account from user_exchange where uid = #{uid} and type='1'),'%')) OR (black_type ='4' AND black_num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{matchineId},'%')) and handle_type = '2' limit 0,1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_black_info(uid, tid, black_type, black_num, handle_type) values (#{uid}, #{tid}, #{blackType}, #{blackNum}, 2)
